title: Can i leave pes uni after 2nd sem? Ps- I have serious health issue and a valid reasom.

comments.body: You can leave, but if I remember correctly they will charge you a certain amount as penalty.
Hey can you please reply in dm.

If you feel like you can't continue here you can definitely leave. My friend left after sem 1 and he wasn't charged anything extra. Another kne of my friends left in sem 3. Your health and well-being should be your top priority. I think they take a percentage of your fees if you leave while a semester is going on. Just talk to your HoD once and get everything clarified
Someone else has answered it. I am not sure of the amount though. In my batch, people who left before 4 years were charged x% of their fees.
